monster.name: Drake Companion (UA)
monster.immune: determined by the drake's draconic essence trait

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 + five times your ranger level (the drake has a number of hit dice [d10s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Draconic Essence
trait.text: When you summon the drake, choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The chosen type determines the drake's damage immunity, the damage of its bite, and the damage of its Infused Strikes trait.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 piercing damage plus PB damage of a type determined by the drake's Draconic Essence.

reaction.name: Infused Strikes
reaction.text: When another creature within 30 feet of the drake that it can see hits with a weapon attack, the drake infuses the strike with its essence, causing the attack to deal an extra 1d6 damage of the type determined by its Draconic Essence.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: 2020 Subclasses Pt5 p. 3
